New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 49th ODI century, equalling Sachin Tendulkar's record
Ravindra Jadeja took career-best figures of 5 for 33 in ODIs
India scored 326/5, their highest score in the match
South Africa's total of 83 was their second-lowest in ODIs
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli's century was a pivotal moment
Ravindra Jadeja's five-wicket haul turned the match in India's favor
South Africa's poor batting performance led to their low total
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as favorites due to their home advantage
Rohit Sharma's performance in the powerplay set the foundation for India's innings
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's performance
Ravindra Jadeja highlighted the importance of team effort
The win was significant for India's World Cup campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's victory ended a ICC trophy drought since 2013
The match was a memorable birthday for Virat Kohli
Others: Weather conditions were challenging but did not significantly impact the match
